solution_line_template: Yesterday before her rock collecting trip, she had {minerals_now} - {found_minerals} = <<{minerals_now}-{found_minerals}={minerals_yesterday}>>{minerals_yesterday} mineral samples.

She has 1/2 the number of gemstones, so she has {minerals_yesterday} / {gemstone_ratio_denominator} = <<{minerals_yesterday}/{gemstone_ratio_denominator}={gemstone_samples}>>{gemstone_samples} gemstone samples.
